import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react'; import ValidateNumber from '../Context/ValidateNumber' import Tooltip from '@material-ui/core/Tooltip'; import InfoIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Info'; import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton'; import { useZohoContext } from '../Context/ZohoContext'; const EditorGlobal = () => { const [roles, setRoles] = useState([]); const [preRol, setPreRol] = useState([]); const [contacts, setContacts]= useState([]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const {codigos} = useZohoContext(); const [datos, setDatos] = useState({ First_Name: '', Last_Name: '', Email:'', Mobile:'', Rol_Contacto: [], Stores_ids:[], neg: true, foto:false }) const [emailError, setEmailError]= useState(false); return (

Contactos Asociados a la Negociación

{(emailError)? dominio @rappi.com no permitido: Email incorrecto}
(cód de país "+52")(cod ciudad "22") XXXXXXX
Roles a cumplir:
); } export default EditorGlobal;
